original_title: Prima triumphs at National Supply Chain Excellence Awards for 2nd consecutive year
original_body_lines: Prima Group Sri Lanka Ceylon Agro Industries General Manager Sajith Gunaratne receiving the Special Commendation Award at the National Awards of Excellence for the Best Supply Chain Practicing Organisation in the Large Scale category from Special Guest International Federation of Purchasing and Supply Management CEO Markku Henttinen, and Chief Guest International Federation of Purchasing and Supply Management President Eng. Chris Oanda, in the presence of officials of the Institute of Supply and Materials Management and Ceylon Agro Industries Ltd., Prima Group Sri Lanka

Ceylon Agro Industries (CAI) Ltd. (Prima Group Sri Lanka) was honoured with the National Award of Excellence for Best Supply Chain Practising Organisation, along with a Special Commendation Award in the Large Scale Commendation category, at the National Supply Chain Excellence Awards 2024.

Organised by the Institute of Supply and Materials Management in partnership with the Ministry of Industries and the Industrial Development Board, these accolades recognise industry leaders who exemplify best practices in supply chain management.

Ceylon Agro Industries (Prima Group Sri Lanka) distinguished itself through a dedicated focus on advanced technology and robust risk management strategies, which have bolstered its resilience and adaptability within the fast-paced FMCG sector. The company’s leadership has cultivated a culture of innovation within its supply chain, logistics, and warehouse teams, empowering employees to drive continuous improvements in processes.

Prima Group Sri Lanka Ceylon Agro Industries General Manager Sajith Gunaratne received the Special Commendation Award. In his acceptance remarks, he shared, “We are deeply humbled and honoured to receive the National Award of Excellence for Best Supply Chain Practising Organisation for the second consecutive year. This achievement is a testament not only to our dedication but also to the invaluable contributions of our suppliers and service providers, who have played a vital role in making this recognition possible. We are committed to upholding our industry leadership and continuing to pursue excellence in all that we do.”

Ceylon Agro Industries (Prima Group Sri Lanka) provides a wide range of popular value-added food products, including wheat-based goods, poultry items, dairy products, and agricultural products. Known for quality, convenience, and affordability, its products are designed to meet the needs of Sri Lanka’s diverse consumer base. The Company said this prestigious award is a testament to Ceylon Agro Industries (Prima Group Sri Lanka)’s unwavering commitment to excellence in supply chain management and its ongoing contributions to shaping the future of the food industry in Sri Lanka.
